patthana14.8:1.1: Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassano ca naanidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana14.8:2.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
